items.name: angle-slider
items.title: Angle Slider
items.description: An interactive circular slider for selecting angles with support for single values and ranges.

items.name: checkbox-group
items.title: Checkbox Group
items.description: A group of checkboxes with support for controlled and uncontrolled state.

items.name: circular-progress
items.title: Circular Progress
items.description: A circular progress indicator with support for determinate and indeterminate states.

items.name: color-picker
items.title: Color Picker
items.description: A color picker component with HSL, RGB, and hex input support.

items.name: color-swatch
items.title: Color Swatch
items.description: A color swatch component for displaying colors with various sizes and transparency support.

items.name: cropper
items.title: Cropper
items.description: A powerful image and video cropper with zoom, rotation, and customizable crop areas.

items.name: combobox
items.title: Combobox
items.description: A combobox component with search, filtering, and selection capabilities.

items.name: editable
items.title: Editable
items.description: An editable text component with inline editing capabilities.

items.name: file-upload
items.title: File Upload
items.description: A file upload component with drag and drop support and progress tracking.

items.name: segmented-input
items.title: Segmented Input
items.description: A group of connected input fields that appear as a single segmented visual unit.

items.name: kanban
items.title: Kanban
items.description: A kanban board component with drag and drop functionality.

items.name: listbox
items.title: Listbox
items.description: A listbox component for selecting items from a list with keyboard navigation.

items.name: masonry
items.title: Masonry
items.description: A masonry layout component for creating Pinterest-style grids.

items.name: mask-input
items.title: Mask Input
items.description: An input component with customizable input masking and validation patterns.

items.name: marquee
items.title: Marquee
items.description: An animated scrolling component that continuously moves content horizontally or vertically.

items.name: media-player
items.title: Media Player
items.description: A media player component with controls for audio and video playback.

items.name: mention
items.title: Mention
items.description: A mention component for @mentions in text input with autocomplete.

items.name: rating
items.title: Rating
items.description: An accessible rating component that allows users to provide star ratings with support for half values, keyboard navigation, and form integration.

items.name: relative-time-card
items.title: Relative Time Card
items.description: A card component that displays relative time with hover details.

items.name: scroller
items.title: Scroller
items.description: A custom scrollbar component with smooth scrolling and navigation indicators.

items.name: scroll-spy
items.title: Scroll Spy
items.description: A scroll spy component that highlights navigation links based on scroll position with smooth scrolling.

items.name: sortable
items.title: Sortable
items.description: A sortable list component with drag and drop reordering.

items.name: stepper
items.title: Stepper
items.description: A stepper component for multi-step forms and workflows.

items.name: stack
items.title: Stack
items.description: A stack component for displaying overlapping elements with various orientations and directions.

items.name: qr-code
items.title: QR Code
items.description: A QR code component with support for different formats (canvas, SVG, image) and download functionality.

items.name: tour
items.title: Tour
items.description: A guided tour component that highlights elements and provides step-by-step instructions to help users learn about your application.

items.name: tags-input
items.title: Tags Input
items.description: A tags input component for adding and removing tags with keyboard support.

items.name: client-only
items.title: Client Only
items.description: A utility component that only renders its children on the client side.

items.name: direction-provider
items.title: Direction Provider
items.description: A provider component for managing text direction (LTR/RTL) context.

items.name: hitbox
items.title: Hitbox
items.description: A utility component that extends the clickable area of interactive elements for better accessibility and user experience.

items.name: portal
items.title: Portal
items.description: A utility component for rendering content in a different part of the DOM tree.

items.name: presence
items.title: Presence
items.description: A utility component for managing enter/exit animations and presence states.

items.name: visually-hidden
items.title: Visually Hidden
items.description: A utility component that hides content visually while keeping it accessible to screen readers.

items.name: visually-hidden-input
items.title: Visually Hidden Input
items.description: A utility component for creating accessible hidden input elements.

items.name: utils
items.title: Utils
items.description: Utility functions for class name composition and other common tasks.

items.name: compose-refs
items.title: Compose Refs
items.description: Utility for composing multiple React refs into a single ref.
